## blockRendering.Debug class

An object that renders rectangles and dots for debugging rendering code.  Blockly.blockRendering.Debug

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Debug 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `Debug` class.
